long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to customize website background colors and text colors according to their preferences, enhancing readability and comfort. 
Additionally, it provides text expansion capabilities, streamlining user productivity. In the future I will be adding the AI assisted text generator and translator to assist users during chats.
